Server - Class in net.neto_framework.server
A server handler that receives and accepts connections using a given protocol.

Server() - Constructor for class net.neto_framework.server.Server
New server that is not bound to anything.

An exception thrown when failing to start/stop a server.

New ServerException with cause exception.
SocketAddress - Class in net.neto_framework.address
A socket address used to define what address to bind to when creating a new socket.

New SocketAddress with localhost and given port.

start() - Method in class net.neto_framework.server.Server

stop() - Method in class net.neto_framework.server.Server
